title: 7/21/17 - How President Trump can crush GOP leadership (Bill O'Reilly & Gov. Greg Abbott Join Glenn)
description:
OJ to be released...and he has a LOT of money waiting for him when he gets out ...Bill O'Reilly joins Glenn ...Fox News rates plummeting ...A sincere thank you to our audience ...If the GOP congress doesn't get major tax reform soon, it could spell doom for the president ...The great thing about President Trump

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
